title: Fully loaded to 100% but couldn't enter game
body:
I just started a ranked game and my game fully loaded to 100%. 

However, there was a player who was classified as "Not Connected". I waited for almost 20 minutes and a pop-up message came up saying I was disconnected. Before you know it, I was put into the end-game chat and I was reported for AFK.

replies.body:
Hey @Yomi86.

I had the identically same issue as yourself various times and found out that it's actually a client side bug. I'd recommend repairing or re-downloading your League Client completely.
Feel free to add me in-game and ask anything :) Happy to help!

Hey there Yomi,

Has this ever occurred to you before? Has this occurred since you made this thread?

Hi there,

It hasn't happen since then. Seems like a one-off but it's frustrating since it resulted in a defeat (even without me playing) as well as being reported for something I had no clue / intention whatsoever.

Unfortunately things like this can occasionally occur, however the problem it sounds like it's resolved now. I would still recommend you [run a repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) on your client though, just to be sure there's nothing wrong with your install.

Don't worry about the loss/reports you'll be fine, especially if this was only a once off, you only get punished if you consistently leave/afk in games.
